Description.Text: Other amenities/services:Rooms with Balcony, Central heating, Telephone, Shower/WC,Refrigerator. Sitting room, Breakfast room, Bar, Credit cards, Safe box, Wake up service.
Omportant place or monument close to hotel: Hotel located on the most beautiful area of Myrina, known as “Riha Nera” in only 100 meters distance from the sandy beach.
